Welcome to our event

Best Practice Van Workshop

Tuesday 26th September

GTG West Midlands, Bearing Drive,
Willenhall, Wolverhampton WV11 3SZ

10am–3pm

Lunch and refreshments

Join us to find out more about:

  • Health and safety best practice
  • Autokontrol – a system that helps you achieve safety on site, fuel savings, reduction in emissions and improved duty of care compliance.
  • Lightfoot – award-winning government-supported technology that is helping to make our roads safer, our environment cleaner and motoring less expensive

Want to know more about this expert industry workshop? Contact jo.leeson@activacontracts.co.uk
